input.sentences: this is a picture of a tree .
this is a picture of the ocean .
this is a picture on a cloudy day .
this is a picture of the woods .

output.sentences: The tree in this picture is growing parallel to the ocean.
This picture shows the same ocean but the tree appears to be floating away.
This picture is taken on a cloudy day.
This picture was taken deeper in the woods behind the sea.
The last picture is a sunset on the beach far from the woods.
